title: Now What?: A Story of Broken Dreams and the God Who Restores Them
features: What do you do when all your hopes and dreams come crashing down around you? When life doesn’t go as you planned? Have you ever messed up so badly that you felt like you'd ruined your future for good? Now What? is a story of how God redeems every broken piece of our lives to ensure that none of our pain is in vain. Divorce, miscarriage, job loss… All of us have had some sort of life-altering experience when we’ve stared upward hopelessly and asked, "Now What?" This humorous yet practical book will guide you as you discover that:-You are not alone.-God hasn't abandoned you. -There is hope for a good future. -You can overcome the lies on repeat in your mind with the Truth. -You can use your pain and passion to realize your purpose.God has something greater than you can imagine planned on the other side of your "Now What?" moment if you'll trust Him and come along for the ride."A must-read for anyone who has ever felt abandoned or hopeless. No matter your own situation, you will benefit from this book. For the first time in my life I feel like I'm not alone." —Rebekah, single mom from Tampa, FL
description: Rachel Dawn grew up in a small farm town in Kentucky and married her "Prince Charming" young (as many small-town girls do). By age 25, she found herself divorced, discouraged, disenchanted, and completely starting over. The lessons she learned rebuilding her life, regaining her courage, and reigniting her dreams have since inspired countless others. Today she is a sought-after speaker. Rachel lives in Cincinnati, Ohio, with her wonderful husband, Barry, and two crazy dogs.
